item.title: Blindarch - An Accessible Arch Linux Installer / Live CD
item.description: A project based on Talking Arch to create an ArchLinux live + install CD for blind and visually impaired users. Also offers an easy to use installer to allow users to set up a completely accessible and customisable arch linux installation.
